gst.ui.dialog

Class SignalViewPropertyDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • gst.ui.dialog.SignalViewPropertyDialog

  • public class SignalViewPropertyDialog
extends java.lang.Object
    Dialog for enabling and disabling coordinated zooming and scrolling for SignalViews.

    0.0.0.1 (13.12.2012)
    Author:
